name: Baskhead
description: Play basketball like you've never played before!This time you aren't the player, or even the ball - you're the hoop. Balls will be flying at your head (literally). Your goal is to catch them all, in rhythm and with skill!BASKHEAD is fun to play... and even funnier to watch!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
